name: BREAKS
description:
This is a mashup of all the games i loved when i was young.

Keyboard Player 1
Movement (Left Arrow / Right Arrow)
Launch the ball (Down Arrow)
Using item (L)
Select item (K / M)

Keyboard Player 2
Movement (D / G)
Launch the ball (F)
Using item (W)
Select item (Q / E)

Gamepad
Launch the ball (A)
Using item (X)
Select item (Left Shoulder / Right Shoulder)
